explanation: [0-0] By a swimming pool, a man with clown makeup on his face, wearing a black and white striped shirt, a black hat, and white gloves, is standing next to a pool. Another man with a beard, wearing a blue tie-dye T-shirt and gray shorts, and a black baseball cap, is standing next to him, taking a selfie with his phone.
